title.narrative: Programme of emergency response in the areas affected by the South Sudanese crisis in South Sudan, Ethiopia and Uganda

description.narrative: La presente Iniziativa intende intervenire in Sud Sudan, Etiopia ed Uganda in risposta alla crisi umanitaria protratta e all’emergenza complessa - in un’ottica di supporto dei servizi di base e ricostruzione del tessuto socio-economico - attraverso progetti OSC in linea con la metodologia del Linking Relief Rehabilitation and Development e con i principi del New Way of Working ed il nesso Umanitario-Sviluppo-Pace.

The Programme aims at responding to protracted humanitarian crisis and complex emergency – by supporting basic services and reconstructing the socio-economic fabric – through NGÒs implemented projects in line with the Linking Relief Rehabilitation and Development (LRRD) and the New Way of Working and the Humanitarian-Development-Peace (HDP) nexus.
